github.description: GitHub operations - PRs, issues, repos | Replace (?) with your GitHub Personal Access Token from https://github.com/settings/tokens

firecrawl.description: Web scraping and crawling | Replace (?) with your Firecrawl API key from https://firecrawl.dev

supabase.description: Supabase database operations | Replace (?) with your Supabase project reference ID from your project settings

memory.description: Persistent memory across sessions | No configuration needed - ready to use!

sequential-thinking.description: Chain-of-thought reasoning | No configuration needed - ready to use!

vercel.description: Vercel deployments and projects | No configuration needed - ready to use!

railway.description: Railway deployments | No configuration needed - ready to use!

cloudflare-docs.description: Cloudflare documentation search | No configuration needed - ready to use!

cloudflare-workers-builds.description: Cloudflare Workers builds | No configuration needed - ready to use!

cloudflare-workers-bindings.description: Cloudflare Workers bindings | No configuration needed - ready to use!

cloudflare-observability.description: Cloudflare observability/logs | No configuration needed - ready to use!

clickhouse.description: ClickHouse analytics queries | No configuration needed - ready to use!

context7.description: Live documentation lookup | No configuration needed - ready to use!

magic.description: Magic UI components | No configuration needed - ready to use!

filesystem.description: Filesystem operations | Replace (?) with the absolute path to your projects directory (e.g., /Users/yourname/projects or C:\Users\yourname\projects)

_instructions.step_1: Search for all (?) placeholders in this file
_instructions.step_2: Replace each (?) with the appropriate value as described in the 'description' field
_instructions.step_3: Remove any MCP servers you don't need (to preserve context window)
_instructions.step_4: Copy the entire 'mcpServers' object to your ~/.claude/settings.json file
_instructions.step_5: Restart Claude Code for changes to take effect

_required_replacements.github: GitHub Personal Access Token - Get from: https://github.com/settings/tokens (needs repo, read:org scopes)
_required_replacements.firecrawl: Firecrawl API Key - Get from: https://firecrawl.dev
_required_replacements.supabase: Supabase Project Reference ID - Found in your Supabase project settings URL
_required_replacements.filesystem: Absolute path to your projects directory (e.g., /Users/yourname/projects)

_optional_servers.note: These servers work without configuration - remove the ones you don't need:

_tips.context_limit: Keep under 10 MCP servers enabled to preserve context window
_tips.security: NEVER commit this file with real API keys to git!
_tips.testing: Test one MCP server at a time to verify configuration
_tips.disabling: To disable per-project, use 'disabledMcpServers' array in project config
